attributes.action: Lower the premium for young male drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should young male drivers have to pay over the odds and sometimes upto 3 times as much for car insurance than women. It's discrimination towards all young male drivers. We're not all boy racers, some of us need a car to travel to work and to earn a living. How are we meant to do that when we have to pay out thousands to insure the smallest engine car possible.

It's time you treated us fairly and stopped discriminating against us all!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
